system.availability: A Trade agreement with the Alien Stryxis, giving +20 to all Interaction Tests to the bearer when dealing with Stryxis. The identity of the bearer is irrelevent, merely whomever presents it.
system.cost: A Rare Xeno Item, They are Good Craftsmanship by default, with no Poor or Common Craftsmanship versions. (if there are, they're probably fake)
